product_name: Katadyn Camp Series Replacement Filter Cartridge
long_description: Use the Katadyn Camp Series Replacement Filter Cartridge to keep your Katadyn Gravity Camp 6L and Base Camp Pro 10L Water Filters (sold separately) in tiptop shape on your backpacking trips.
short_description: Use the Katadyn Camp Series Replacement Filter Cartridge to keep your Katadyn Gravity Camp 6L and Base Camp Pro 10L Water Filters (sold separately) in tiptop shape on your backpacking trips.
